name: Beat Crush - Tap the Tiles
description:
Turn on the sound and enjoy your perfect musical experience with Beat Crush! Try out the most addictive music game – you won’t be able to stop.

HOW TO PLAY

* Catch the rhythm and follow the tiles.
* Take increasing challenges and make crazy combos.
* Complete the whole song and beat your high score.

WHAT YOU GET

* Great variety of genres and tons of levels.
* Breathtaking gameplay perfectly adapted for each song.
* Increasing difficulty so you'll never be bored.
* Addictive challenge to beat your high score with each new song.

Get ready to feel the best music game experience with Beat Crush!
